content.text: Clawdites were a shapeshifting species. Shortly before the outbreak of the Clone Wars, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and his Jedi padawan Anakin Skywalker chased the Clawdite Zam Wessell through Coruscant.

elements.text: Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones
Star Wars: The Clone Wars – "Holocron Heist"
Star Wars: The Clone Wars – "Cargo of Doom"
